DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the changes in protein in lung cells of Asian patients with advanced non small cell lung cancer.
DOC.brief_title: To Study the Changes in Protein in Lung Cells of Asian Patients With Advanced Non-small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC)
DOC.detailed_description: A molecular epidemiology study in Asian patients with advanced NSCLC of adeno histology to assess EGFR mutation status.
DOC.criteria: Histological or cytologically confirmed advanced Non small cell lung cancer of adeno histology NSCLC treatment naive Availability of cancer tissue or cytology sample Involvement in the planning and/or conduct of the study Previous enrollment in the present study
